|m=sāi,sè,sēi,er=y,3nb=Taiwan variant; Beijing dialect
|m_note=sāi - vernacular (“to stuff; to be jammed; stopper”); sāir - “stopper”; sēi - low vernacular (“to stuff”); sè - literary

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[stop up]]; to [[block up]]
# to [[stuff]]; to [[cram]]; to [[squeeze]] in
# to be [[block]]ed; to be [[jammed]]
# to [[forbid]]; to [[suppress]]; to [[prohibit]]
# to [[satisfy]]; to [[fulfil]]
# to [[compensate]]; to [[remedy]]
# to [[answer]]; to [[repay]]
# to [[manage]] to [[arrange]] a [[position]] for someone
# to [[practise]] [[bribe]]
# to [[evade]]; to [[stall]]
# [[stopper]]; [[cork]]
# to be in a [[difficult]] [[position]]; [[destitute]]
# [[honest]]; [[truthful]]
